transcript.title: Building Infrastructure to keep Victoria moving with $3 Billion injection
transcript.content:
The Coalition is getting Victoria moving with The Australian Government finalising its $1.5 billion commitment to the $3 billion Victorian Infrastructure Package.

The investment will see a range of priority projects delivered across urban and regional Victoria following ongoing discussions with the Victorian Government.

A map of the projects is attached.

The list of projects is below:

Key Projects
AG Contribution
$m
Monash Freeway Upgrade
500

350
